work.name: Syntex GreenTech
work.summary: As a Sustainability Consultant at Syntex GreenTech, I focus on developing innovative ESG strategies, supporting financing decisions to mitigate financial risks, and conducting sustainability reporting. My role involves analyzing impacts, risks, and opportunities related to sustainability issues to drive effective environmental and social governance practices.
responsibilities: Development of ESG strategy based on innovation.
Support ESG financing decisions and reduction of financial risk.
Sustainability reporting.
Analysis of impacts, risks and opportunities in relation to sustainability issues.

work.name: Free University of Bozen-Bolzano
work.summary: As a Research and Teaching Assistant at the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano, I am involved in the FRONTSH1P project, which focuses on advancing systemic solutions for a circular and resilient future through local clusters and regional innovation schemes. Additionally, I assist in teaching the Energetics course for the B.Sc. in Industrial and Mechanical Engineering.
highlights: FRONTSH1P project - A FRONTrunner approach for the transition to a circular and resilient future: deployment of systemic solutions with the support of local clusters and the development of regional community-based innovation schemes.
Teaching assistant for the course Energetics of the B.Sc. in Industrial and Mechanical Engineering.
responsibilities: Development and implementation of experimental setups.
Design and execution of laboratory experiments, collection and analysis of data.
Contribution to the preparation of research papers, conference abstracts, grant proposals, and project reports.
Support in teaching activities by mentoring students, and giving exercise classes.
Contribution to the supervision of PhD students.
